en_us.thank_you: I'm very grateful to everyone who believes in my work, who is or has been supporting me. Thank you so much to all of you, even those I didn't mention here, you make the difference! And if you are not yet a {{ supporter }}, please consider becoming one.
en_us.title: Title
en_us.aura_description: A beautiful dark theme for your favorite apps.
en_us.cra_template_good_start_description: A Create React App good starting point template to init a configured app with typescript, sass, eslint, prettier and more.
en_us.yout_description: YoutPlayer is the new way to watch playlists from YouTube on Desktop. No YouTube ads, simple to use, floating window. Available for free for Linux, Mac and Windows.
en_us.netflix_list_exporter_description: An Extension to export your lists from Netflix to Clipboard area and share with your friends.
en_us.electron_screen_recorder_description: A Desktop screen recorder app built using web technologies for Mac, Linux and Windows.
en_us.uni_description: A universal and optimized interface for handle package managers on Linux distributions.
en_us.recipes_for_uni_description: The main recipes repository for UNI. You can create your own or use one of the available recipes.
en_us.hyperinit_description: The ultimate and most complete extension to initialize commands before and after Hyper terminal starts.
en_us.pepper_description: A free and open source simple game that looks like Flappy Bird written in HTML5 and JavaScript.
en_us.omeletetabs_description: An Extension that brings the latest news from omelete.com.br to the browser tabs.
en_us.bio:
ðŸ‘‹ Hi, I'm Dalton. I have {YEARS_CODING} years of experience in software development. Also, I'm a writer and designer.
